sqlMap.select: select BLACKLISTID, PERSONALID, CAUSE, CHANNEL, CENTERID, VALIDFLAG, DATEMODIFIED, DATECREATED, LOGINID, FREEUSE1, FREEUSE2, FREEUSE3, FREEUSE4 from MI607 where CENTERID = #centerid:VARCHAR# and VALIDFLAG = '1' and PERSONALID = #personalid:VARCHAR# order by DATECREATED desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into MI607 (BLACKLISTID, PERSONALID, CAUSE,CENTERID, VALIDFLAG, DATEMODIFIED, DATECREATED, LOGINID, FREEUSE1, FREEUSE2, FREEUSE3, FREEUSE4) values (#blacklistid:VARCHAR#, #personalid:VARCHAR#, #cause:VARCHAR#, #centerid:VARCHAR#, #validflag:CHAR#, #datemodified:CHAR#, #datecreated:CHAR#, #loginid:VARCHAR#, #freeuse1:VARCHAR#, #freeuse2:VARCHAR#, #freeuse3:CHAR#, #freeuse4:INTEGER#)
